questions.question: নিচের কোন বানানটি ঠিক?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় শুদ্ধ বানান: মনস্তত্ত্ব, মুহুর্মুহ, মুহূর্ত, তত্ত্ব, মুমূর্ষু, মহত্ত্ব, মন্বন্তর, প্রিয়মাণ, মৃত্তিকা, সাত্ত্বিক।

questions.question: 'শবরী' শব্দের অর্থ কী?
questions.explanation: শবরী' শব্দটি দ্বারা 'ব্যাধিনী' বোঝায়। 'শবর' শব্দটির অর্থ: শিকারি জাতিবিশেষ।

questions.question: 'বক্তৃতায় যাঁহারা দিগ্বিজয়ী, বক্তিয়ার খিলজি, তাঁহাদের বাক্যের সৈন্য-সামন্ত অত দ্রুতবেগে কোথা হইতে কেমন করিয়া আসে বলিতে পারি না।' উদ্ধৃত অংশটি কোন গল্পের।
'গাছপাথর' বাগধারাটির অর্থ কোনটি?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় বাগধারা গাছে কাঁঠাল গোঁফে তেল (শুরুর আগেই ফলাফলের প্রত্যাশা), গোড়ায় গলদ (শুরুতেই ভুল), গোবর গণেশ (অকর্মণ্য), গুড়ে বালি (আশায় নৈরাশ্য), গৌরীসেনের টাকা (অফুরন্ত অর্থ), গো-বৈদ্য (হাতুড়ে)।

questions.question: 'সুন্দর' এর সমার্থক শব্দ নয় কোনটি?
questions.explanation: 'ধনিক' অর্থ: বিত্তশালী এবং 'ধনিকা' অর্থ ধনিকের স্ত্রী, সাধ্বী স্ত্রী।

questions.question: Turn into the indirect form of speech. "Mother said to him, 'Don't run in the sun'."

options.label: ক
options.text: Mother said told him not run in the sun

options.label: খ
options.text: Mother asked him do not run in the sun

options.label: গ
options.text: Mother requested him not to run in the sun

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Mother forbade him to run in the sun

questions.option_a: Mother said told him not run in the sun
questions.option_b: Mother asked him do not run in the sun
questions.option_c: Mother requested him not to run in the sun
questions.option_d: Mother forbade him to run in the sun
questions.explanation: Forbade নিষেধ করা অর্থে ব্যবহৃত হয়েছে, তাই এর সাথে not হবে না, to + v i হবে।

questions.question: The medicine should ———— his thirst.
questions.explanation: Allay - (যন্ত্রণা, উত্তেজনা, ভয়) লাঘব করা।

questions.question: (A) " Having lived here (B) for seven years, my friend is used to (C) spoke English with (D) all her classmates." - The incorrect part of the sentence is:
questions.explanation: Explanation Be used to/get used to এর v + ing হয়।

questions.question: The meaning of "ORATOR" is:
questions.explanation: Orator - বক্তা (speaker)।

questions.question: The intellectual can no longer be said to live _____ the margins of society.
questions.explanation: Beyond the margins of society – সমাজের সীমার উর্ধ্বে/বাইরে।

questions.question: "He offered me tea but denied it." Select the best alternative that replaces the italic portion of the sentences:
questions.explanation: Deny - প্রত্যাখ্যান করা বা অস্বীকার করা (decline)।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is correct?

options.label: ক
options.text: Come back in an hour time

options.label: খ
options.text: Come back in one hour about

options.label: গ
options.text: Come back in about one hour time

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Come back in an hour's time

questions.option_a: Come back in an hour time
questions.option_b: Come back in one hour about
questions.option_c: Come back in about one hour time
questions.option_d: Come back in an hour's time

questions.question: The opposite of "FLOUT" is:
questions.explanation: Flout বিদ্রূপ করা, এর বিপরীত শব্দ revere (গভীরভাবে শ্রদ্ধা করা)।

questions.question: "Shoes of those kind are bad for the feet , low heels are better." —— The incorrect part of the sentence is: -
questions.explanation: Kind শব্দটি singular তাই এর determiner singular (this) হবে।

questions.question: Angry words may __ strife.
questions.explanation: Engender - কারণস্বরূপ হওয়া (কোনো পরিস্থিতির); রাগান্বিত শব্দ বিবাদের (strife) কারণে হতে পারে।

questions.question: "His conduct shocked me." - The passive form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: I was shocked at his conduct

options.label: খ
options.text: I was shocked by his conduct

options.label: গ
options.text: I was shocked with his conduct

options.label: ঘ
options.text: I was shocked in his conduct

questions.option_a: I was shocked at his conduct
questions.option_b: I was shocked by his conduct
questions.option_c: I was shocked with his conduct
questions.option_d: I was shocked in his conduct
questions.explanation: Shock এর পর ব্যবহার, আচার-আচরণ ইত্যাদি উল্লেখ থাকলে at হয়।

questions.question: All of the following sentences are incorrect except:
questions.explanation: Know থাকলে nothing হয় এবং does not থাকলে anything হয়।

questions.question: "They cried as loudly as they could." - Simple form of this sentence is:

options.label: খ
options.text: They cried on a loud voice

options.label: গ
options.text: They cried at the top of their voice

options.label: ঘ
options.text: They cried at their level best sound

questions.option_b: They cried on a loud voice
questions.option_c: They cried at the top of their voice
questions.option_d: They cried at their level best sound
questions.explanation: At the top কোনোকিছুর সর্বোচ্চ সীমায়।

questions.question: "He kept his promise." - Compound form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: He makes promise and tries to keep it

options.label: খ
options.text: He made promise to keep it.

options.label: গ
options.text: As he made a promise, he kept it

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He not only made a promise but also kept it

questions.option_a: He makes promise and tries to keep it
questions.option_b: He made promise to keep it.
questions.option_c: As he made a promise, he kept it
questions.option_d: He not only made a promise but also kept it

questions.question: "It is supposed that you know." - The active form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: It should be known to you

options.label: খ
options.text: You are supposed to be known

questions.option_a: It should be known to you
questions.option_b: You are supposed to be known

questions.question: The meaning of "LETHAL" is:
questions.explanation: Lethal - প্রাণঘাতী, মারাত্মক (deadly)।

questions.question: Turn into the indirect form of speech. "How did you do that?" they said Edison.

options.label: ক
options.text: They asked Edison how he had done that.

options.label: খ
options.text: They asked Edison how had he done that.

options.label: গ
options.text: They asked Edison how did he do that.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: They asked Edison how that was done.

questions.option_a: They asked Edison how he had done that.
questions.option_b: They asked Edison how had he done that.
questions.option_c: They asked Edison how did he do that.
questions.option_d: They asked Edison how that was done.

questions.question: The opposite of "DECRY" is:
questions.explanation: Decry (নিন্দা করা) এর বিপরীত শব্দ praise (প্রশংসা করা)।

questions.question: "I was in two minds about what I should do." Select the best alternative that replaces the italic portion of the sentences.
questions.explanation: Two minds - অনিশ্চয়তায়/দ্বিধাদ্বন্দ্ব।

questions.question: Can you suggest an alternative ——— this proposal.
questions.explanation: Alternative to – বিকল্প।

"Paypal" is a wholly owned subsidiary of -.
questions.explanation: Paypal is an American company operating a worldwide online payments system that supports online money transfers and serves as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders.

questions.question: Which is the biggest destination of Bangladeshi Apparel?
questions.explanation: In a singal way, USA is the biggest destination of Bangladeshi Apparel.

questions.question: Parliament of Bangladesh is a unicameral legislature consisting of:
questions.explanation: There are 50 seats reserved for women.

questions.question: "Parachute" coconut oil is a product of -.
Which organization of Bangladesh along with a Chinese organization has recently invented the genome sequencing of buffalo?
questions.explanation: Bangladeshi scientest Naimul Haq and China have Jointly cracked buffalo genome.

ABCDEFGH What letter is three to the right of the letter immediately to the left of the letter three to the left of the letter two to the right of the letter F?
329:15- 746:34 Which numbers below have the same relationship to each other as the two sets of numbers above?
A large volume of water is gushing through a pipe which narrows at the outlet. At which point, A, B, C or D will the water flow be the fastest?

Leto's department can deliver enough parts to fill a storeroom in 8 hours. Jessica's department uses the part to buld another product. Her department can deplete a full storeroom in 12 hours. Starting with an empty storeroom, how long will it take Leto's area to fill the storeroom while Jessica's department is working?
questions.explanation: Jessica's department is working = 12 × 8 12 − 8 = 12 × 8 4 = 24 =\frac{12 \times 8}{12-8}=\frac{12 \times 8}{4}=24 = 12 − 8 12 × 8 ​ = 4 12 × 8 ​ = 24

questions.question: The sum of the fourth and twelfth term of an arithmetic progression is 20 . What is the sum of the first 15 terms of the arithmetic progression?
questions.explanation: 4 th   term  + 12 th   term  = 20 ⇒ ( a + 3 d ) + ( a + 11 d ) = 20 ⇒ 2 a + 14   d = 20 ∴ a + 7   d = 10 ∴  sum of  15  terms  = 15 { a + ( a + 14   d ) } 2 = 15 ( 2 a + 14   d ) 2 = 15 × 20 2 = 150 \begin{array}{l} 4^{\text {th }} \text { term }+12^{\text {th }} \text { term }=20 \\ \Rightarrow(a+3 d)+(a+11 d)=20 \\ \Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{a}+14 \mathrm{~d}=20 \\ \therefore \mathrm{a}+7 \mathrm{~d}=10 \\ \therefore \text { sum of } 15 \text { terms }=\frac{15\{\mathrm{a}+(\mathrm{a}+14 \mathrm{~d})\}}{2} \\ \qquad=\frac{15(2 \mathrm{a}+14 \mathrm{~d})}{2}=\frac{15 \times 20}{2}=150 \end{array} 4 th   term  + 1 2 th   term  = 20 ⇒ ( a + 3 d ) + ( a + 11 d ) = 20 ⇒ 2 a + 14   d = 20 ∴ a + 7   d = 10 ∴  sum of  15  terms  = 2 15 { a + ( a + 14   d )} ​ = 2 15 ( 2 a + 14   d ) ​ = 2 15 × 20 ​ = 150 ​

Reba's grade was in the 80th percentile out of 120 grades in her class. In another class of 200 students there were 24 grades higher than Reba's. If nobody had Reba's grade, then Reba was what percentile of the two classes combined?

questions.explanation: solution:

questions.question: Bob just filled his car's gas tank with 20 gallons of gasohol, a mixture consisting of 5 % 5 \% 5% ethanol and 95 % 95 \% 95% gasoline. If his car runs best on a mixture consisting of 10 % 10 \% 10% ethanol and 90 % \mathbf{9 0 \%} 90% gasoline, how many gallons of ethanol must he add into the gas tank for his car to achieve optimum performance?
questions.explanation: So Let x = x= x = number of gallons of par according to the question 1 + x 20 + x = 1 10 \frac{1+x}{20+x}=\frac{1}{10} 20 + x 1 + x ​ = 10 1 ​ ⇒ 10 + 10 x = 20 + x ⇒ 9 x = 10 ∴ x = 10 9 \begin{array}{l} \quad \Rightarrow 10+10 x=20+x \\ \Rightarrow 9 x=10 \\ \therefore x=\frac{10}{9} \end{array} ⇒ 10 + 10 x = 20 + x ⇒ 9 x = 10 ∴ x = 9 10 ​ ​

questions.question: A certain city with population of 132,000 is to be divided into 11 voting districts, and no district is to have population that is more than 10 percent greater than the population of any other district. What is the minimum possible population that the least population district could have?
questions.explanation: Let x x x the population the district with the least population According to the question, x + 10 × ( 1.1 x ) = 132000 ⇒ x + 11 x = 132000 ⇒ 12 x = 132000 ∴ x = 11000 \begin{array}{l} x+10 \times(1.1 x)=132000 \\ \Rightarrow x+11 x=132000 \\ \Rightarrow 12 x=132000 \\ \therefore x=11000 \end{array} x + 10 × ( 1.1 x ) = 132000 ⇒ x + 11 x = 132000 ⇒ 12 x = 132000 ∴ x = 11000 ​
